title: Mobile Microlearning Design to Improve Web-Based Educational Effectiveness

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer software proficiency and understanding of foundational social science theories
context.additional_context: Job-integrated training program for employees, emphasizing practical applicability through task-centered learning.

learning_goals: Learners can complete assignments on a web-based platform with an 85% or higher completion rate.
By scoring 70 or above in formative assessments on software application skills, learners can demonstrate practical applicability.
In mobile environments, learners can exhibit interactive competencies by providing peer feedback three or more times.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
